Units¶

The following units and unit conversions are defined:

units¶

module

units

platform

Unix, Windows, OS

synopsis

Relevant constants and functions used for unit conversion

aqpolypy.units.units.atm_2_bar(p)¶

Conversion of atmosphere to bar

Parameters

p – pressure in atmospheres

Returns

pressure in bar

Return type

float

concentration¶

module

concentration

platform

Unix, Windows, OS

synopsis

Relevant functions used for concentration conversion

aqpolypy.units.concentration.molality_2_molarity(c, vol_solvent, vol_solute, m_solvent)¶

Conversion from molality to molarity conversion

Parameters

  • c – molality in mols_solute / Kg_solvent

  • vol_solvent – molar volume of solvent in SI units

  • vol_solute – molar volume of solute in SI units

  • m_solvent – molecular weight of the solvent

Returns

molarity in mols / L

Return type

float

aqpolypy.units.concentration.molarity_2_molality(c, vol_solvent, vol_solute, m_solvent)¶

Conversion from molarity to molality conversion

Parameters

  • c – molarity in mols / L

  • vol_solvent – molar volume of solvent in SI units

  • vol_solute – molar volume of solute in SI units

  • m_solvent – molecular weight of the solvent

Returns

molality mols_solute / Kg_solvent

Return type

float
